actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: The dragon makes two attacks with its claws and one attack with its bite.

actions.name: Claw
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 1d6+5 slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 2d8 piercing damage, plus 2d8 poison damage.

actions.name: Charming Gaze
actions.detail: A creature that can see Hexia must make a DC 14 WIS save or be charmed by her (save ends).

actions.name: Grasping Vines
actions.detail: One creature within 120' must make a DC 14 STR save or be restrained, until it or an adjacent creature uses an action to remove the vines.

actions.name: Nightmare
actions.detail: One creature within 120' of Hexia must make a DC 14 WIS save or take 15 ongoing psychic damage (save ends) and have its movement speed reduced to 0' for its next turn.

actions.name: Poison Breath (recharge 5/6)
actions.detail: Each creature in a 60' cone must make a DC 17 CON save or take 9d6 poison damage (half damage on save).
